attributes.action: Opt-In access to dailymail.co.uk and move the newspaper to the "under the counter" section
attributes.additional_details:
Every household in the UK should have access to the Daily Mail blocked by their internet provider unless they choose to receive it.

Too many times, we the people, have clicked on an item of news only to find that it has come from this unreliable, mis-informed source.

No more shall we visit friends or relatives to be told "that gives you cancer you know, I read it in the Daily Mail".

End the relentless attacks on our intellegence.
